name: Twilight
description:
This map is available for Serious Sam: The Second Encounter and Serious Sam Classics: Revolution. It is also officially implemented in Serious Tournament Mod.

Author: Rakanishu 
Creation date: 10 May 2014
Latest Version: 23 May 2021 (Version 2)

Changelog

Version 2
* Changed position and color in level list.
* High Quality Thumbnail

Note : The map hasn't been updated to Serious Sam: Revolution
